properties.name: jwt.key
properties.description: The key used to sign the JWT token

properties.name: jwt.expire
properties.description: The expiration time of the JWT token in days

properties.name: jwt.limit.base
properties.description: 为用户生成Jwt令牌的冷却时间，防止刷接口频繁登录生成令牌，以秒为单位

properties.name: jwt.limit.upgrade
properties.description: 用户如果继续恶意刷令牌，更严厉的封禁时间

properties.name: jwt.limit.frequency
properties.description: 判定用户在冷却时间内，继续恶意刷令牌的次数

properties.name: myweb.verify.mail-limit
properties.description: 邮箱验证码发送限制，单位秒

properties.name: myweb.flow.limit
properties.description: 流控周期内的访问次数限制

properties.name: myweb.flow.block
properties.description: 流控周期内访问次数超限后的封禁时间，单位秒

properties.name: myweb.cors.credentials
properties.description: 跨域请求是否允许携带cookie
